headline: Now Streaming: Analysts boost Netflix targets after Q1 beat
summary: “Now Streaming” is The Fly’s weekly recap of the stories surrounding the biggest content streamers. headline: Members of Congress Are Buying This Beaten-Down "Magnificent Seven" Stock (Hint: It's Not Nvidia or Tesla)
summary: The U.S. Congress might not be the place you want to look for guidance on anything financial-related.  After all, the national debt is over $36.7 trillion and growing, and every penny of the money spent by the federal government had to be approved by Congress.  It doesn't make sense to mimic anyone's stock trades without thought, but Congress can be a place to find stocks worth checking out.
